# Request for Proposal: Janitorial Services

## Tender Overview

The Canadian Museum of Nature invites experienced and qualified firms to submit a proposal to provide janitorial services at the Victoria Memorial Museum Building (VMMB) in Ottawa, ON, Canada.

### Contract Details

* Contract Type: Service-Based
* Duration: June 1, 2023 to May 31, 2028
* Location: Victoria Memorial Museum Building (VMMB), 240 McLeod Street, Ottawa, ON

### Background

The Canadian Museum of Nature seeks a contractor to provide comprehensive janitorial services, including cleaning and maintenance of the VMMB. The successful vendor will be responsible for ensuring a clean and healthy environment for staff, visitors, and exhibits.

### Tender Requirements

* Respondents must be experienced and qualified firms with a proven track record in providing janitorial services.
* Firms must submit a proposal in accordance with the attached terms of reference and statement of work.
* Proposals must be submitted electronically via the Bonfire website: https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca.
* Bidders must first register on the Bonfire website and create an online profile.

### Important Notes

* All bidders must submit their proposals on time, as late submissions will not be considered.
* Documents obtained from sources other than the Bonfire website will not be recognized during the bid and award process.
* Vendors relying on documents from other sources do so at their own risk and may result in the rejection of their bid.

### Contact Information

For technical help or to submit a proposal, please contact:

* Michelle Garber, Procurement Agent
	+ Email: Approvisionnement-Procurement@nature.ca
	+ Phone: 613-566-4240
	+ Website: https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca/portal/support
